thread.title: Colorado Springs police: Husband, wife had sex with 14-year-old
thread.title_full: Colorado Springs police: Husband, wife had sex with 14-year-old - The Denver Post

author: Jesse Paul
title: Colorado Springs police: Husband, wife had sex with 14-year-old
text:
Colorado Springs police on Thursday announced the arrest of a husband and wife they suspect sought out and had sex with a 14-year-old.
Investigators, who did not release the teen's gender, say the couple may have more unidentified victims.
Jacob Rahricht, 29, and Cortney Rahricht, 21, are being held at the El Paso County jail in the case, police said.
Detectives first began investigating the couple in August, police said in a news release.
"During the investigation, detectives developed information indicating that the Rahrichts may have sought out other children for the purpose of having sexual encounters," the release said.
Authorities say the couple were living at an apartment near South 8th Street and Oxford Lane.
Anyone who may have had inappropriate or physical contact with the Rahrichts is asked to contact Detective Alan Van'tland with the Special Victims Section at (719) 444-7538.
Jesse Paul: 303-954-1733, jpaul@denverpost.com or @JesseAPaul
